location.title: Station 1
location.subtitle: Student Service Centre
location.description: Located at T16 (The block directly facing Dover MRT Station), the Student Service Centre (SSC) is a first point of contact for students to obtain information, guidance and services.

location.title: Station 2
location.subtitle: Foodcourt 5
location.description: Hungry? This newly renovated food court is fully air-conditioned and caters to those who prefer western food, with outlets such as KFC, Subway and Starbucks.

location.title: Station 3
location.subtitle: Swimming Pool and Gym
location.description: Work out at the newly renovated Fitness Gym, with full-length glass walls facing our mineral-water swimming pool.

location.title: Station 4
location.subtitle: Rock Climbing and Giant Screen
location.description: Witness the fun and vibrancy of sporting life on campus such as the rock wall and basketball courts.

location.title: Station 5
location.subtitle: Moberly
location.description: Come by at the end of a school day to chill out and relax at our recreational hub with jamming studios, snooker rooms, and so much more!

location.title: Station 6
location.subtitle: Library
location.description: Check out our two libraries : the Main Library and the Hilltop Library.

location.title: Station 7
location.subtitle: Innovillage@SP
location.description: Explore the exciting 26,000 square foor InnoVillage@SP. A living innovation eco system for future technology and lifestyle.

location.title: Station 8
location.subtitle: Nutrition, Health and Wellness Centre
location.description: Check out this new centre with the widest range of latest equipment and set-ups in various laboratories.

location.title: Station 9
location.subtitle: The Biostream
location.description: This stream boats an abundance of fish and plant life. Come see this water miracle for yourself!

location.title: Station 10
location.subtitle: Designworks Singapore
location.description: This is a design-based and innovation centre, with its core mandate to push the application of design thinking and to nurture creative enterprise.
